column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=The other day my dad was riding his bike and started having trouble steering .
#text=He rode the bike back home and then took it into the back yard to have a look at it .
#text=He noticed that the front tire was flat and was n't keeping air in it .
#text=First he pumped it up and tried to see if the tire would hold air .
#text=Then he rubbed liquid dish detergent on the tire and pumped it up and looked for where it bubbled to see where the hole was .
#text=Once he found the hole , he decided if it needed a patch or a plug .
#text=It was a small round hole so he decided to put a plug in it .
#text=He got the packages of plugs and found one that was the right size .
#text=He followed the instructs on the package to insert the plug into the hole and secure it .
#text=He pumped the tire back up and it held air .
#text=He put the tire back on the bike .
